title: [中世纪地图]MUG CASTLE —— 中世纪城堡|马克杯城堡|
author: Qwe_Sakura
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Qwe_Sakura 于 2020-3-21 09:39 编辑 
MUG CASTLEの基础信息MUG CASTLE——马克杯城堡[spoiler]地图版本1.10.2作者为BLOCKMASTER3310grimreaperdylan下载链接原帖百度云盘提取码: 3kfa 
MUG CASTLEの介绍MUG CASTLE——马克杯城堡
Mug Castle includes the following: 2 markets 1 park-like area, entrance bridge, guard houses, barracks, armory, stables, sculptures/fountains, watch towers, storage building, prison, blacksmith, ruins, courthouse, farms, village governor house, secrets, a ship, riverside markets, riverside stores, port, roads/paths, tavern, stage, hobo shack, bath house, Colosseum/arena, lookouts, training grounds, jungle fortress, a park, boathouse, windmill, King's stables, animal farms, church, mansion(I guess), and the KEEP with many different things inside!


马克杯城堡内部包括以下这些建筑：2个市场1个公园式区域，入口桥，警卫室，军营，军械库，马s，雕塑和喷泉，钟楼，仓库，监狱，铁匠，废墟，法院，农场，村长，秘密，船，河边市场，河边商店，港口，道路/小径，小酒馆，舞台，流浪汉棚，浴室，罗马斗兽场/竞技场，监视点，训练场，丛林要塞，公园，船屋，风车，国王马s，动物农场，教堂，大厦（我猜）和KEEP里面有很多不同的东西！

One day I was doing something.......I don't remember what it was, WHEN! My friend called me on Skype and asked me if I wanted to build a castle or large structure in Minecraft (That's pretty much how it went....it was that abrupt). I actually really wanted to build something on Minecraft, but usually no one wanted to help me so this was like a kind of cool dream come true. Once I logged onto the world I realized he had already started on the build. It was just a bridge looking thing sticking out of the cliff. After we finished the bridge looking thing (the bridge at the entrance of the castle). We started planning out where buildings were gonna go, and it pretty much went from their. When we finished about half of the buildings and the wall at the entrance, we started building the wall ALL THE WAY AROUND THE AREA. We finished the about one eighth of the wall when we just couldn't build anymore. Then I remembered the fill command recently added! It pretty much fixed our wall problem. Then we just went on from there. My friend sucks at making things look fancy, while I hate building large structures. So while he built the foundation and shape of every building, I made them look like buildings, instead of cubic structures. Thats about it.


一天我在做某件事.......我不记得那是什么时候了！我的朋友在Skype(我不知道是什么www)上打电话给我，问我要不要在我的世界中里建造一座城堡或大型建筑物（这几乎是怎么回事...那是如此突然）。我的心理是真的很想在我的世界上创造一些建筑，但是经常没有人可以帮助我，所以这就像一个难以实现的梦想成真。进入到主世界之后，我看到到他已经开始建筑城堡。那只是一座看起来从悬崖上伸出来的东西的桥。在我们完成了看起来像桥梁的东西之后（城堡入口处的桥梁）。我们就要开始计划建筑物的地方了，当我们快要完成了一半的建筑物和入口处的城墙时，我们于是乎便开始在城堡周围建造城墙。当我们感到自己已经无法建筑的时候，我们已经完成了大约八分之一的墙。突然我想起了最近添加的fill指令！它快几乎解决了我们的城墙问题。然后我们用fill指令继续建筑。我的朋友(应该指grimreaperdylan)讨厌让建筑看起来花里胡哨，但是我讨厌建造大型建筑。所以，每当他为了一座建筑物建立基础结构和形状时，我让他们看起来更加像一个建筑物，而不是单纯的立方体结构。就这。
